meanings.definition: A type of weightlifting equipment consisting of a long metal bar with weights attached at each end.
meanings.sent1: At the gym, I lifted heavy barbells to strengthen my muscles.
meanings.sent2: The athletes were using barbells to train for the weightlifting competition.
meanings.sent3: When the barbells started talking, everyone was surprised at the strong voices.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like lifting heavy barbells, pushing through challenges effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The shiny barbells clanked together as the weightlifter completed each repetition.
